com.ieireference.system.io

Class OSTemp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ieireference.system.io.OSTemp

  • public final class OSTemp
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a class with access the OS Temp, You can make files or directories in the OS Temp.

    • Constructor Summary

      OSTemp()

    • Constructor Detail

      • OSTemp

    • Method Detail

      • createTempDirectory

        public static java.io.File createTempDirectory(java.lang.String prefix,
                                               java.lang.String someRandomSuffix,
                                               boolean deleteOnExit)
        Make a directory on temp.
        The directory have the prefix like "myDir" and suffix like "Temp". Resulting in prefix + suffix ("myDirTemp"). If the directory exist he will be deleted and created.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix. Is not necessary add '\'
        someRandomSuffix - optional if you want like "myDirNumber62665452"
        deleteOnExit - optional, if You want delete on exit true else false.
        Returns:
        the directory as File created.

      • getOSTemp

        public static java.lang.String getOSTemp()
        Returns:
        If not fail, returns the OS Temp Directory.
